languages.text: "Губернатор Драйвстем заверил, что даже недавние разрушительные и трагические события не смогут омрачить это торжественное событие".
"Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."
languages.original_text: "Губернатор Драйвстем заверил, что даже недавние разрушительные и трагические события не смогут омрачить это торжественное событие".

traits.locale_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."
"Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."
"Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."
"Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

languages.text: 「最近起きた壊滅的な悲劇でさえ、この至高の時に影を落とすことは許されないと、ドライブステム総督は誓っています」
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: 「最近起きた壊滅的な悲劇でさえ、この至高の時に影を落とすことは許されないと、ドライブステム総督は誓っています」

languages.text: “德莱夫斯塔总督表示，尽管前不久发生过一系列毁灭性的悲剧，但他绝不会让这最光荣的时刻蒙尘。”
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: “德莱夫斯塔总督表示，尽管前不久发生过一系列毁灭性的悲剧，但他绝不会让这最光荣的时刻蒙尘。”

languages.text: «El Drivestem ha jurado que ni siquiera la reciente serie de tragedias devastadoras manchará esta gloriosa ocasión».
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: «El Drivestem ha jurado que ni siquiera la reciente serie de tragedias devastadoras manchará esta gloriosa ocasión».

languages.text: « Le gouverneur Drivestem a juré qu'il ne laisserait pas les récents incidents, aussi tragiques soient-ils, faire de l'ombre à un événement aussi glorieux. »
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: « Le gouverneur Drivestem a juré qu'il ne laisserait pas les récents incidents, aussi tragiques soient-ils, faire de l'ombre à un événement aussi glorieux. »

languages.text: "Gouverneur Drivestem hat geschworen, dass nicht einmal die aktuellen furchtbaren und tragischen Ereignisse einen Schatten auf diesen höchst glorreichen Anlass werfen werden."
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Gouverneur Drivestem hat geschworen, dass nicht einmal die aktuellen furchtbaren und tragischen Ereignisse einen Schatten auf diesen höchst glorreichen Anlass werfen werden."

languages.text: "Vali Drivestem, yakın zamandaki yıkıcı ve trajik olayların bile bu pek görkemli hadiseye gölge düşürmesine müsaade edilmeyeceğine söz verdi."
languages.original_text: "Governor Drivestem has vowed that not even the recent devastating and tragic events will be permitted to cast a shadow over this most glorious occasion."

traits.locale_text: "Vali Drivestem, yakın zamandaki yıkıcı ve trajik olayların bile bu pek görkemli olaya gölge düşürmesine müsaade edilmeyeceğine söz verdi."
